sentences.en: He quickly vacated the gym after the workout.
sentences.cn: 锻炼完他很快离开了健身房。

sentences.en: This workout helps you to burn off fat and tone muscles.
sentences.cn: 这项锻炼有助于消耗脂肪，使肌肉强健。

sentences.en: Gym owner David Barton will guide them through a workout.
sentences.cn: 健身房主人戴维•巴顿将指导他们完成锻炼。
